block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: DAC ADC - DAC 26 ADC 39 plot DAC set value vs ADC reading - connect DAC (pin 26) to ADC(pin 39)
2 100UF 10nF Try 2 run of this code 1st run, without capacitor on power supply line 2nd run, add 100UF and 10nF and try again The readings from 2nd run should be a lot cleaner than the 1st run

block.comment: DAC ADC need a short delay after set DAC output before we read analog reading using ADC

scripts.comment: 10 repeat 10 times with different color to show the noise
- DAC ADC - - Note that - the non-linear response of DAC to ADC is visible from the graph - sudden spikes is due to noise - means it will not appear on repeated draws

block.comment: DAC ADC need a short delay after set DAC output before we read analog reading using ADC
